metadata.name: The Children of the Sun 1
metadata.description:
The Children of the Sun

The Children of the Sun have come here to lead by example. These enlightened ones are here to awaken the youth to the inward journey of Divine love, kindness, peace and benevolent actions and lifestyle. These are the shining ones who have started a counterculture,  attracting those who embrace Truth and liberty. 

These ones are usually free spirits, old souls, nonconformists, and free thinkers.  Their ethos includes various forms of ancient mysticism as well as a desire to establish oneness through gratitude, respect and a more harmonious relationship with the natural world.
